sentence.Network_en: A riding accident left him immobile.
sentence.Network_cn: 一场骑马意外事故导致他瘫痪。

sentence.Network_en: She stood immobile by the window.
sentence.Network_cn: 她一动不动地靠窗站着。

sentence.Network_en: The dog lay at rest absolutely immobile.
sentence.Network_cn: 那条狗安静地躺着,纹丝不动.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 有道学堂 | 微英语 ... C. stagnant 停滞的、不景气的； D. immobile 固定的。 A. determining 决定；.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(67) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... immixture 混合 immobile 稳定 immobilise 使不动.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... mobile a 活动的，可动的 immobile a 不动的 mobility n 能动性.
托福阅读精选词汇_天道留学 ... nonchalant adj. 冷淡的，满不在乎的 immobile adj. 静止的 n.稳定 breeze n. 微风.

list.abs: immobile interface 固定界面immobile liquid 固定液immobile oil 不动油
Res humani iuris 人法物Res immobiles 不动产Res incerta 不确定物
...immobile layer of compensation ion 补偿离子停止层immobile posture 不动姿势immobilization 固定
...修饰作用(用葡萄糖修饰SOD增加其半寿期,提高耐热性,耐酸碱性等.用葡萄糖和聚乙二醇修饰尿激酶等).3.固定化酶(immobilized enzyme):将水溶性酶用物理或化学方法,使之成为不溶于水的,但仍具有酶活性的状态.4.人工模拟酶—化学法合成酶(已知酶的活性中心和作用机理).
固醇 sterol固相酶 immobilized enzyme岩藻糖 fucose

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, from Latin immobilis, from in- 'not' + mobilis (see mobile)

entry.def: Someone or something that is immobile is completely still.

example.ex: Joe remained as immobile as if he had been carved out of rock.
example.tran: 乔一动不动,仿佛一尊石头雕像。

entry.def: Someone or something that is immobile is unable to move or unable to be moved.

example.ex: A riding accident left him immobile.
example.tran: 一场骑马意外事故导致他瘫痪。
非常沉重或难以移动的物体

means.word_mean: 1. not capable of movement or of being moved

sentences.sentence: "the post was still firm after being hit by the car"

auth_sentence.content: Recent studies show the sun is not totally immobile.
auth_sentence.res_content: Recent studies show the sun is not totally immobile.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Recent studies show the sun is not totally immobile.

auth_sentence.content: The Turks sat in Medina on the defensive, immobile.

auth_sentence.content: He is nothing more than a brain encased in immobile flesh.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不动的,固定的,静止的,不能移动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: im不+mobile[adj.可动的,活动的,运动的]→adj.不动的,固定的,静止的,不能移动的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可动性,机动性,[阶层间的]流动性
stems_affixes.word_buile: mobile[adj.可动的,活动的,运动的]+ity性质→n.可动性,机动性,[阶层间的]流动性
de去掉,反+mobilize动员→反过来动员→复员
mobile[adj.可动的,活动的,运动的]+ize做→mobilize使[人]动→动员[入伍]
mob动→n.暴民,乌合之众[尤指暴力者] v.围攻,聚众闹事

means.word_mean: 不能活动的, 不能移动的

sentences.en: For a moment shock held her immobile.
sentences.cn: 有那么一会儿她惊讶得不能动弹。

sentences.en: The dog lay at rest absolutely immobile.
sentences.cn: 那条狗安静地躺着, 纹丝不动。
